title: "EV appeal is more diverse than you think"
excerpt: "Fifty-two percent of Asian American, 43 percent of Latinos, 38 percent of Blacks and 33 percent of whites said they would “definitely” or “seriously consider” purchasing or leasing an EV as their next vehicle."
